about_the_game:
Dungeon Dash - Tales of the Necromancer is a fast paced arcade-puzzle RPG where you, young Necromancer, dashes through the levels trying to find your true self. Encounter hordes of enemies, traps, puzzles and secrets. Gather loot to upgrade the town and build yourself a nice armor set and weapons.

Fully customize yourself, change your hair, beard, shirt, shoes, pants, armor and weapons independently to express your inner wizard. Each outfit gives different bonuses and determines your playstyle.

Dungeon Dash is in early development. We made the choice to release it for free as another project has taken off. I hope you enjoy it and consider Wishlisting that project Chronomon to support a small dev. 

Features:

  • Dashing - No more walking to get where you want, quickly dash in the direction you want to go.

  • Character Customization - Fully customize your Necromancer from top to bottom. Choose dashing gold armor or put on only a cowboy hat and boots.

  • 80+ hand made levels filled with puzzles, traps and enemies

Future Development

  • Items - Gather items while dashing around to craft new weapons and armor.

  • Online PVP - Compete against a friend or foe in a procedurally generated dungeon. See if you playstyle is better.

  • 200+ levels and biomes

  • Large questline and Town building to unlock more features

Dungeon Dash - Tales of the Necromancer is a fast paced arcade-puzzle RPG where you, young Necromancer, dashes through the levels trying to find your true self. Encounter hordes of enemies, traps, puzzles and secrets. Gather loot to upgrade the town and build yourself a nice armor set and weapons.

Fully customize yourself, change your hair, beard, shirt, shoes, pants, armor and weapons independently to express your inner wizard. Each outfit gives different bonuses and determines your playstyle.

Dungeon Dash is in early development. We made the choice to release it for free as another project has taken off. I hope you enjoy it and consider Wishlisting that project Chronomon to support a small dev. 

Features:

  • Dashing - No more walking to get where you want, quickly dash in the direction you want to go.

  • Character Customization - Fully customize your Necromancer from top to bottom. Choose dashing gold armor or put on only a cowboy hat and boots.

  • 80+ hand made levels filled with puzzles, traps and enemies

Future Development

  • Items - Gather items while dashing around to craft new weapons and armor.

  • Online PVP - Compete against a friend or foe in a procedurally generated dungeon. See if you playstyle is better.

  • 200+ levels and biomes

  • Large questline and Town building to unlock more features
name: Dungeon Dash - Tales of the Necromancer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ / DirectX 11+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Dungeon Dash is a fast paced puzzle arcade where you "Dash" your way through dungeons and maps. Customize your character, unlock new armor.
